dt: {bc}any of a breed of hunting dogs resembling a small English foxhound and originally bred for hunting rabbits

et: Middle English {it}hayrer, heirer, eirer,{/it} of uncertain origin, later reshaped after {et_link|hare:1|hare:1} and {et_link|harrier:3|harrier:3}
shortdef: any of a breed of hunting dogs resembling a small English foxhound and originally bred for hunting rabbits
a runner on a cross-country team

dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Circus{/it}) of slender hawks having long angled wings and long legs and feeding chiefly on small mammals, reptiles, and insects

shortdef: any of a genus (Circus) of slender hawks having long angled wings and long legs and feeding chiefly on small mammals, reptiles, and insects
